query.name: findAggregatesByTableName
query.sql: SELECT count(*), av.column_name FROM audit_event a,audit_event_values av WHERE a.audit_id = av.audit_id and a.audit_table = ? group by av.column_name

query.name: findAllByUserId
query.sql: select ae.* , aev.old_value, aev.new_value, aev.column_name, aec.study_id, aec.subject_id from audit_event ae, audit_event_values aev, audit_event_context aec where ae.audit_id=aev.audit_id and ae.audit_id = aec.audit_id and ae.user_id=? order by ae.audit_date desc

query.name: findEventStatusLogByStudySubject
query.sql: select ae.* , aev.old_value, aev.new_value, aev.column_name from audit_event ae, audit_event_values aev, study_event se where (ae.audit_table='STUDY_EVENT' or ae.audit_table='Study Event') and ae.audit_id=aev.audit_id and ae.entity_id=se.study_event_id and aev.column_name='Subject Event Status ID' and se.study_subject_id=? order by ae.audit_date desc limit 5

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: select ae.* , aev.old_value, aev.new_value, aev.column_name, aec.study_id, aec.subject_id from audit_event ae, audit_event_values aev, audit_event_context aec where ae.audit_id=aev.audit_id and ae.audit_id = aec.audit_id and aec.study_id=? order by ae.audit_date desc

query.name: findAllByStudyIdAndLimit
query.sql: select ae.* , aev.old_value, aev.new_value, aev.column_name, aec.study_id, aec.subject_id from audit_event ae, audit_event_values aev, audit_event_context aec where ae.audit_id=aev.audit_id and ae.audit_id = aec.audit_id and aec.study_id=? order by ae.audit_date desc limit 20
